actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 555 15th Street, Northwest in Huron, South Dakota as the "Gladys Pyle Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office Building at 555 15th Street, Northwest, Huron, South Dakota, as the Gladys Pyle Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 555 15th Street, Northwest in Huron, South Dakota as the "Gladys Pyle Post Office Building".
